doc:
Wendy Richard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wendy_Richard 0 Wendy Richard, (born Wendy Emerton, 20 July 1943 – 26 February 2009) was an English actress best known for playing the roles of Miss Shirley Brahms on Are You Being Served? and Pauline Fowler on EastEnders, the latter for nearly 22 years. Until the onscreen death of her EastEnders character in December 2006, she was one of only two original cast members of that programme to appear continuously from the first episode in 1985, along with Adam Woodyatt, who played her on-screen nephew Ian Beale. She died on 26 February 2009 at the Harley Street clinic where she was being treated for breast cancer. Wendy_Richard , ( born_Wendy_Emerton , 20_July_1943 – 26_February_2009 ) was an_English_actress best_known for playing the_roles of Miss_Shirley_Brahms on Are You Being_Served ? and Pauline_Fowler on EastEnders , the_latter for nearly_22_years . Until the_onscreen_death of her_EastEnders_character in December_2006 , she was one of only_two_original_cast_members of that_programme to_appear continuously from the_first_episode in 1985 , along with Adam_Woodyatt , who played her_on-screen_nephew_Ian_Beale . She died on 26_February_2009 at the_Harley_Street_clinic where she was_being_treated for breast_cancer .
